mutants.code:
def calculate_factorial_modulo(T: int, numbers: list[int]) -> list[int]:
    MOD = 1589540032
    max_n = max(numbers)
    factorials = [1] * (max_n + 1)
    for i in range(2, max_n + 1):
        factorials[i] = factorials[i - 1] * i % MOD
    results = [factorials[n] for n in numbers]
    return results
